Text: I have bad news for you. I did try that before, run lucky patcher and all did work fine for the 3 first boot-ups, after the 4th android boot the SPB app got busy and was asking to either uninstall or buy from market. I reinstalled it and run lucky patcher again, and same thing happened, I did keep trying but this app is a tough cookie. do it yourself and see what I'm talking about.

And I have news for you...I've been using it for the past two months...older versions and this latest one so idk what your problem may be...maybe check your setting and make sure you have "Unknown sources" checked in applications...Good Luck!
P.S Try installing in "Airplane" mode if not then try Droid Wall from the market but you must be rooted to use this method...GOOD LUCK!

I'm gonna try yours, the one I did try before was bobiras2009 version. 
IN your torrent you included lucky launcher v2.2.4, but I'll test it with lucky launcher v2.4.4 which is the one I have. I'll check back in a few to report.
